title: 6 month old phone.only front camera works in every app. The back camera in no apl
content: Potential new phone, on every app (Instagram, Snapchat, Facebook etc.) Only the front camera works. The back Cemera is not working at all. In the camera app. Says to restart. I did. Says to do the camera fixing box. Done everything. Now I need the back camera asap and I have none.
